string.value: I'll start building the Altar. In the meantime, I'll need you to gather 9 Sabbath Candles so we can officially start the festival. If you could help me out, I'd greatly appreciate it!
Glad to hear it. Ok, They can be found on those strange horned mushroom creatures. Come back here when you've got 9!
Alright. I still need your help, though, so be sure to come back!
Great job! I think these candles will be enough to begin the Festival of Lights! Thanks for your hard work, please take this present as a token of my appreciation.
Thanks again! If you want to open this present box, then would you like me to help you open up the present?
Ah, you've returned...with not enough candles, I see. I'll need 9 to start the Festival. See you when you get them!
